title: Patient-Reported Outcomes in Older Adults With Transthyretin Amyloid Cardiomyopathy - JACC

summary.text: **KEY FINDING**: Only 67% of older adults completed PRO assessments, highlighting the need for improved engagement strategies.
**TACTICAL WIN [ROADMAP]**: Develop AI-driven reminders to reduce dropout rates by targeting at-risk patients during critical phases.
**MARKET SIGNAL [ðŸ”´ URGENT]**: FDA's new mandate requires PRO integration in trials, creating a 12-month window for compliant solutions.
**CONCERN**: The study's reliance on self-reported data may introduce bias, potentially affecting the accuracy of clinical outcomes.
